ProjectTemplate.Title: I/O DCAF Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Creates a DCAF Module from a template which has been customized to aid in the development of new modules for I/O with a configurable number of channels.

ProjectTemplate.Title: User Control Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Creates a DCAF Module from a template that allows users to implement their control logic within a single VI. This template can only be used with logic that has a fixed number of channels, but it includes a script to generate all code necessary for interacting with those channels.
ProjectTemplate.LocationPath: dcaf configurable plugin module/user control module
